front.title: Enhanced DetNet Data Plane (EDP) Framework for Scaling Deterministic Networks

abstract.t: The Enhanced Deterministic Networking (EDN) is required to provide the enhancement of flow identification and packet treatment for Deterministic Networking (DetNet) to achieve the DetNet QoS in large- scale networks. This document proposes the enhancement of packet treatment to support the functions and metadata for Enhanced DetNet Data plane (EDP). It describes related enhanced controller plane considerations as well.
